name: EMPLOYMENT-AGREEMENT
points:
Rating 8:
Ramesh agrees to maintain the confidentiality of all such information and not to disclose it to any unauthorized parties during or after employment, except as required in the performance of his duties or with the explicit written consent of the Company.
Rating 3:
Ramesh acknowledges that any inventions, developments, software code, or other intellectual property created or discovered by him during the course of employment and related to the Company's business shall be the exclusive property of the Company.
Rating 8:
During the term of employment and for a period of 2 years following the termination of employment, Ramesh agrees not to engage in any employment, consulting, or business activities that directly compete with the Company's business or interests without prior written consent from the Company.
Rating 5:
Ramesh further agrees not to solicit or hire any employees, contractors, or clients of the Company for a period of 2 years  following the termination of employment, without the prior written consent of the Company.

name: HOUSE-LEASE-AGREEMENT
points:
Rating 3:
Landlord hereby leases to the Tenant and Tenant hereby leases from the Landlord, the residential property located at [Property Address] (the "Property"), including all fixtures, furnishings, and appliances specified in Schedule A attached hereto.
Rating 8:
The security deposit shall be refundable within 30 days of the termination of this Agreement, subject to deductions for any unpaid rent, damages beyond normal wear and tear, or any other expenses incurred by the Landlord due to the Tenant's breach of this Agreement.
Rating 3:
The Tenant shall be responsible for all utilities, including but not limited to electricity, gas, water, sewerage, internet, cable TV, and telephone services, unless otherwise specified in Schedule C attached hereto.
Rating 10:
The Landlord may terminate this Agreement for cause, including but not limited to non-payment of rent, violation of lease terms, or breach of any applicable laws or regulations.
Rating 8:
Upon termination, the Tenant shall vacate the Property and return the keys to the Landlord, leaving the Property in a clean and undamaged condition, subject to normal wear and tear.
